content:
- X Drake and Scotch make their first appearance after the timeskip.
- Caribou will be jailed in Udon's Prisoner Mine at Wano Country, where he will meet Luffy again during the Wano Country Arc.

metadata.source: database/Caribou's Kehihihihi in the New World.txt
metadata.title: Caribou's Kehihihihi in the New World
